meanings.definition: The top stone of a structure or wall.
meanings.sent1: The capstone of the castle gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent3: The capstone of the party was the surprise guest appearance.
meanings.sent4: The award ceremony served as the capstone of their efforts.
meanings.sent5: The capstone moment was when they reached their fundraising goal.
